text.zh: 第一次加载时间可能较长，请稍等...
text.en: It may take a while to load the first time, please wait...

subheading.zh:
昵称：陈默
喜欢音乐、阅读、摄影和旅游。
subheading.en:
Nickname: Chen Mo
English Name: Chandler
Like music, reading, photography and traveling.

intro_text1.zh:
我不善言语，不擅温言宽慰
时常偏执，学不会伪装
性子很傲，慢热但是重感情
intro_text1.en:
I am not eloquent or skilled in comforting,
sometimes paranoid, never disguise,
slow to warm up, yet emotionally intense.

intro_text2.zh:
因为生活简单，见识比谁都少
学不会勾心斗角，心眼都没发育太大
没有开挂人生，只是个平凡无奇的人
intro_text2.en:
With a simple life and limited knowledge,
not skilled in manipulation, straightforward in nature.
No extraordinary life, just an ordinary person.

intro_text3.zh:
经常被生活锤得心灰意冷
但也总能鼓起勇气缓慢前行
intro_text3.en:
Often battered by life,
yet always finding the courage to move forward slowly.

globe1.zh:
我喜欢旅行，去不同的地方
领略不同的风景、不同的建筑、不同的风土人情
globe1.en:
I enjoy traveling, exploring diverse landscapes,
architectures, and local customs of different places.

experience1.zh:
当浑浊成为了一种常态
清白便是一种罪过
experience1.en: When turbidity becomes the norm, purity is a sin.

experience2.zh:
我不愿轻易听信他人
总想通过自己的所见所闻所感得出对世界的定义
experience2.en:
Reluctant to easily believe others,
always defining the world through
personal observations, experiences, and emotions.

photo.zh:
偶尔也会打开相机
记录着这一刻独一无二的经历
photo.en:
I seize the opportunity to capture
the essence of some extraordinary moments with my camera sometimes.

text-design.zh:
大学里自己捣鼓学了很多东西
从PPT到平面、UI、网页、用户体验等等
text-design.en:
I self-taught a wide range of skills in college,
from PPT, Graphic design, UI to Web engineer, Interaction design etc.

programming1.zh:
大学参加设计比赛，获奖后进入了 吐司工作室
从此，正式踏进计算机的大门，进入了程序员的世界
programming1.en:
Participated in the design competition during college,
won awards and joined Toast Studio.
Since then, stepped into the realm of computers,
entering the world of programming.

programming2.zh:
毕业后在 上海柏楚电子 工作
认识了许多有趣的人，也确信了自己还需更多沉淀
programming2.en:
Worked for Friendess Electronic after graduation.
Met many interesting people and realized
the need for further personal growth and accumulation.

programming3.zh:
一意孤行来到离家9000公里的 Trinity大学读研
虽然很菜，但也一直在努力地拓宽自己的知识面
programming3.en:
Determined to come to Trinity 9000 kilometers away from home.
Although my ability is far from enough,
I have been trying to broaden my horizon.

text-dot-connecting.zh:
当不断尝试把自己的所想所爱结合在一起
创造些有意思的东西时, 真的会感到莫大的满足
text-dot-connecting.en:
When combining my thoughts and passions together,
and creating something intriguing,
it truly brings a tremendous sense of fulfillment.

paragraph1.zh: 2019年基于阿里云服务器，使用WordPress搭建的个人博客。新拟态风格的博客网站，用来发布在平时学习编程，过程中遇到的问题，记录了许多编程笔记。
paragraph1.en: A personal blog built in 2019 using WordPress on an Alibaba Cloud server. It features a new neumorphic design style and is used to publish programming-related content, documenting programming notes and the problems encountered during the learning process.

paragraph2.zh: 后来，也会在里面加入一些心情杂记，给我杂乱的脑子来一个缓冲。
paragraph2.en: Later on, I also started including some miscellaneous personal thoughts in the blog, serving as a buffer for my cluttered mind.

paragraph1.zh: 写博客和敲代码时，总喜欢加入一些emoji图标，增加趣味性。手机上还好说，电脑上获取emoji就不是很方便。正好利用2020年流行起来的玻璃拟态制作一个emoji网站。
paragraph1.en: When writing blog posts or coding, I always like to add emoji icons to make things more interesting. It's easy to do on a phone, but not as convenient on a computer. So, I decided to create an emoji website using the trendy glassmorphism design style that became popular in 2020.

paragraph.zh:
自己开发的东西能被别人所用，算是最大的满足。
基于新拟态UI风格，使用Vue框架开发的大学Web端题库，另有音乐播放器，与炫酷音效的待办事项。
paragraph.en:
One of the greatest satisfactions is when something I developed can be used by others.
Little Cookies is a university web-based question bank developed using the neumorphic UI design style and Vue framework,. It also includes a music player and a stylish task manager with cool sound effects.

paragraph.zh:
“一个人如果不读书，那他的三观只能由周围人决定”。
快节奏的社会下，似乎催生了人的戾气，社交软件下满是戾气的文字无疑让人心生厌恶。而读一些大作家的短篇文章总让人远离心浮气躁，进而修身养性。
paragraph.en:
If a person doesn't read, their perspective will be determined solely by those around them.
In today's fast-paced society, it seems to breed people's hostility. The negative content on social media is undoubtedly off-putting. Reading short stories by great writers helps to distance oneself from restlessness and cultivate one's character.

paragraph.zh:
想了解更多？
你需要的都在这里。
paragraph.en:
Want to know more?
Everything you need is here.

nicknameDescription.zh: 留下你的昵称吧，会公开显示。
nicknameDescription.en: Leave your nickname, it will be displayed publicly.

emailDescription.zh: 当这条留言收到回复时会发送邮件通知你，不会公开显示。
emailDescription.en: You will receive an email notification when this message receives a reply. It will not be displayed publicly.

websiteDescription.zh: （选填）个人网站或社交网站主页均可。
websiteDescription.en: (Optional) Personal website or social media profile.

messageSentDescription.zh: 为防止广告信息，所有留言都会在审核之后才会公开显示。
messageSentDescription.en: To prevent spam, all messages will be displayed publicly after review.
